name: fire-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: A fiery punch that may burn the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the foe with a burn.
